titles.ar: باب الْإِخْوَةِ مِنَ الْأُمِّ مَعَ الْجَدِّ
titles.en: Chapter 21 – The brothers from the mother (half-brothers), with the grandfather
Chapter 22 – A son of a brother (nephew), and a grandfather

titles.ar: باب الْإِخْوَةِ مِنَ الْأُمِّ مَعَ الْجَدِّ
titles.en: Chapter 21 – The brothers from the mother (half-brothers), with the grandfather

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: صحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (3/165)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ ابْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنِ ابْنِ سِنَانٍ قَالَ

text: سَأَلْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) عَنْ رَجُلٍ تَرَكَ أَخَاهُ لِأُمِّهِ لَمْ يَتْرُكْ وَارِثاً غَيْرَهُ قَالَ الْمَالُ لَهُ قُلْتُ فَإِنْ كَانَ مَعَ الْأَخِ لِلْأُمِّ جَدٌّ قَالَ يُعْطَى الْأَخُ لِلْأُمِّ السُّدُسَ وَ يُعْطَى الْجَدُّ الْبَاقِيَ قُلْتُ فَإِنْ كَانَ الْأَخُ لِأَبٍ وَ جَدٌّ قَالَ الْمَالُ بَيْنَهُمَا سَوَاءً .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ibn Mahboub, from Ibn Sinan who said,

‘I asked Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> about a man who left his brother from his mother, not having left an inheritor apart from him’. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘The wealth is for him’. I said, ‘So if there was with the brother from the mother, a grandfather?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘The brother from the mother would be given a one-sixth, and the grandfather would be given the remainder’. I said, ‘So if there was a brother from the father, and a grandfather?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘The wealth would be (divided) between the two of them, equally’.
en.sarwar: 1. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from ibn Mahbub from ibn Sinan who has narrated the following: “I once asked abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, about the case of a man who leaves behind his brother from his mother. He (the Imam) said, ‘If he has not left other heirs besides him the legacy belongs to him.’ I then asked about a brother from a mother with a grandfather. He (the Imam) said, ‘One-sixth must be given to the brother from his mother and the rest is given to the grandfather.’ I then asked about a brother from the father and a grandfather. He (the Imam) said, ‘The legacy between them is in equal shares.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مجهول - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (23/166)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ إِسْمَاعِيلَ وَ عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ يُونُسَ جَمِيعاً عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ الْفُضَيْلِ عَنْ أَبِي الصَّبَّاحِ الْكِنَانِيِّ قَالَ

text: سَأَلْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) عَنِ الْإِخْوَةِ مِنَ الْأُمِّ مَعَ الْجَدِّ قَالَ الْإِخْوَةُ مِنَ الْأُمِّ فَرِيضَتُهُمُ الثُّلُثُ مَعَ الْجَدِّ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Muhammad Bin Ismail, and Ali Bin Ibrahim, from Muhammad Bin Isa, from Yunus, altogether from Muhammad Bin Al Fuzayl, from Abu Al Sabaah Al Kanany who said,

‘I asked Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> about the brothers from the mother with the grandfather. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘The brothers from the mother, their Obligatory (legislated share) is the one-third, with the grandfather’.
en.sarwar: 2. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from Muhammad ibn ’Isma‘il and Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from Muhammad ibn ‘Isa from Yunus all from Muhammad ibn al-Fudayl from abu al-Sabbah al-Kinaniy who has narrated the following: “I once asked abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, about the case of brothers from one’s mother, with a grandfather. He (the Imam) said, ‘The share of brothers from one’s mother with a grandfather is one- third.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مجهول - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (23/166)

narrator_chain.text: وَ عَنْهُ عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنْ حُسَيْنِ بْنِ عُمَارَةَ عَنْ مِسْمَعٍ أَبِي سَيَّارٍ قَالَ

text: سَأَلْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) عَنْ رَجُلٍ مَاتَ وَ تَرَكَ إِخْوَةً وَ أَخَوَاتٍ لِأُمٍّ وَ جَدّاً قَالَ فَقَالَ الْجَدُّ بِمَنْزِلَةِ الْأَخِ مِنَ الْأَبِ لَهُ الثُّلُثَانِ وَ لِلْإِخْوَةِ وَ الْأَخَوَاتِ مِنَ الْأُمِّ الثُّلُثُ فَهُمْ فِيهِ شُرَكَاءُ سَوَاءً .

en.hubeali: And from him, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad and Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Mahboub, from Husayn Bin Umara, from Misma’a Abu Sayyar who said,

‘I asked Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> about a man who died and left brothers and sister from the mother, and a grandfather. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘The grandfather is at the status of the brother from the father, for him would be two-thirds; and for the brothers and the sisters from the mother is the one-third, so they would be participants in it, equally’.
en.sarwar: 3. It is narrated from the narrator of the previous Hadith from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from and Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from his father from ibn Mahbub from Husayn ibn ‘Umarah from Misma‘ abu Sayyar who has narrated the following: “I once asked abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, about the case of a man who dies and leaves behind brothers and sisters from his mother and a grandfather. He (the Imam) said, ‘The grandfather is like a brother from the father. He receives two-thirds and brothers and sisters from one’s mother receive one-third who distribute it among themselves in equal shares.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (3/166)

narrator_chain.text: الْحُسَيْنُ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ الْأَشْعَرِيُّ عَنْ مُعَلَّى بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ الْوَشَّاءِ عَنْ أَبَانِ بْنِ عُثْمَانَ عَنْ أَبِي بَصِيرٍ قَالَ

text: قَالَ أَبُو جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) أَعْطِ الْأَخَوَاتِ مِنَ الْأُمِّ فَرِيضَتَهُنَّ مَعَ الْجَدِّ .

en.hubeali: Al Husayn Bin Muhammad Al Ashary, from Moala Bin Muhammad, from Al Hassan Bin Ali Al Washa, from Aban Bin Usman, from Abu Baseer who said,
‘Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Give to the sisters from the mother, their Obligations (legislated shares) with the grandfather’.
en.sarwar: 4. Al-Husayn ibn Muhammad al-Ash‘ariy has narrated from Mu‘alla’ ibn Muhammad from al-Hassan ibn Ali al-Washsha’ from Aban ibn ‘Uthman from abu Basir who has narrated the following: “Abu Ja‘far, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said, ‘Two shares belong to the sisters from one’s mother if a grandfather is with them.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: صحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (3/166)

parts.text: أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) فِي الْإِخْوَةِ مِنَ الْأُمِّ مَعَ الْجَدِّ

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ ابْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ رِئَابٍ عَنِ ابْنِ مُسْكَانَ عَنِ الْحَلَبِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) فِي الْإِخْوَةِ مِنَ الْأُمِّ مَعَ الْجَدِّ قَالَ

text: لِلْإِخْوَةِ مِنَ الْأُمِّ مَعَ الْجَدِّ نَصِيبُهُمُ الثُّلُثُ مَعَ الْجَدِّ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ibn Mahboub, from Ali Bin Raib, from Ibn Muskan, from Al Halby,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> regarding the brothers from the mother, with the grandfather. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘For the brothers from the mother with the grandfather, their share is the third with the grandfather’.
en.sarwar: 5. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from ibn Mahbub from Ali ibn Ri’ab from ibn Muskan from al- Halabiy who has narrated the following: “About the case of brothers from one’s mother with a grandfather, abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said, ‘The share of brothers from one’s mother is one-third if a grandfather is with them.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (23/167)

parts.text: أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) فِي الْإِخْوَةِ مِنَ الْأُمِّ مَعَ الْجَدِّ

narrator_chain.text: حُمَيْدُ بْنُ زِيَادٍ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ سَمَاعَةَ عَنْ جَعْفَرِ بْنِ سَمَاعَةَ وَ صَالِحِ بْنِ خَالِدٍ عَنْ أَبِي جَمِيلَةَ عَنْ زَيْدٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) فِي الْإِخْوَةِ مِنَ الْأُمِّ مَعَ الْجَدِّ قَالَ

text: لِلْإِخْوَةِ مِنَ الْأُمِّ فَرِيضَتُهُمُ الثُّلُثُ مَعَ الْجَدِّ .

en.hubeali: Humeyd Bin Ziyad, from Al Hassan Bin Muhammad Bin Sama’at, from Ja’far Bin Sama’at and Salih Bin Khalid, from Abu Jameela, from Zayd,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> regarding the brothers from the mother, with the grandfather. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘For the brothers from the mother is their Obligations (legislated share), being the one-third, with the grandfather’.
en.sarwar: 6. Humayd ibn Ziyad has narrated from al-Hassan ibn Muhammad ibn Sama‘ah from Ja‘far ibn Sama‘ah and Salih ibn Khalid from abu Jamilah from Zayd who has narrated the following: “About the case of a man who leaves behind brothers from his mother with a grandfather, abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said, ‘The ordained shares of brothers from one’s mother is one-third if a grandfather is with them.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مجهول كالصحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (23/167)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ إِسْمَاعِيلَ عَنِ الْفَضْلِ بْنِ شَاذَانَ عَنْ صَفْوَانَ عَنِ ابْنِ مُسْكَانَ عَنِ الْحَلَبِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: سَأَلْتُهُ عَنِ الْإِخْوَةِ مِنَ الْأُمِّ مَعَ الْجَدِّ فَقَالَ لِلْإِخْوَةِ لِلْأُمِّ فَرِيضَتُهُمُ الثُّلُثُ مَعَ الْجَدِّ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Ismail, from Al Fazal Bin Shazaan, from Safwan, from Ibn Muskan, from Al Halby,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup>, said, ‘I asked him<sup>asws</sup> about the brothers from the mother, with the grandfather, so he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘For the brothers from the mother, their Obligation (legislated share) is the one-third, with the grandfather’.
en.sarwar: 7. Muhammad ibn ’Isma‘il has narrated from al-Fadl ibn Shadhan from Safwan from ibn Muskan from al-Halabiy who has narrated the following: “I once asked abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, about the case of brothers from one’s mother with a grandfather. He (the Imam) said, ‘The ordained share of brothers from one’s mother is one-third if a grandfather is with them.’”
